about.details:
Incorporated in 1986, Crayons Advertising Limited is an Integrated marketing and communications agency. They offer 360-degree solutions to a wide array of clients.

Established with the object and vision to provide advertising solutions, Crayons Advertising has expanded its business horizons continuously during its operations in the industry for over 36 years.

Crayons is one of the few agencies that can truly claim to be fully integrated and independent in providing marketing and communications solutions. It has provided a wide area of scope of work being offered and provided to its clients.

They offer world-class creative, exceptional brand marketing strategy, pragmatic online & offline media planning & buying, cutting-edge digital expertise, on-ground & virtual activation capabilities, and design solutions that help clients in brand building.

Crayons Advertising Limited offers a high-end ecosystem and end-to-end ad-tech communication solutions platform. These are for advertising media services consisting of Brand Strategy, Events, Print Media, Digital Media, and Outdoor (OOH) Media services.

These services are offered under various advertisement modes such as Newspapers, Brochures, Magazines, Television Channels, FM channels, and display of Outdoor Hoardings, etc.

faqs.question: What is the Crayons Advertising IPO?
faqs.answer:
Crayons Advertising IPO is a SME IPO of 6430000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹41.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹65 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on May 22, 2023, and closes on May 25, 2023.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Crayons Advertising IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Crayons Advertising IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Crayons Advertising IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Crayons Advertising IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Crayons Advertising IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Crayons Advertising IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Crayons Advertising IPO opens on May 22, 2023 and closes on May 25, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Crayons Advertising IPO?
faqs.answer: Crayons Advertising IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,30,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Crayons Advertising IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Crayons Advertising IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Crayons Advertising IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Crayons Advertising IPO will be done on Tuesday, May 30, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, June 1, 2023. Check the Crayons Advertising IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Crayons Advertising IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Crayons Advertising IPO listing date is on Friday, June 2, 2023.
